Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Martha Greenhouse Papers
Greenhouse, Martha
Greenhouse, Martha
WAG.217
5 Linear Feet (5 boxes)
undated This collection contains material relating to the American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA) and other theatrical unions. 1 2 3 4 5
Scope and Contents
This collection contains material relating to the American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA) and other theatrical unions.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Martha Greenhouse Papers; WAG 217; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Use Restrictions
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Martha Greenhouse was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. .
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Martha Greenhouse, 2002. The accession number associated with this gift is 2002.038.
Greenhouse, Martha
